name: UGT1A1 inhibition can increase exposure of UGT1A1 substrates
actions: Consider alternatives to the inhibitor when feasible (educational).
If used together, monitor for dose-related adverse effects of the affected drug.

rationale: Reduced Phase II metabolism can increase {A_name} exposure.

explanation_template: {B_name} inhibits UGT1A1 and {A_name} relies on UGT1A1 metabolism. This can increase {A_name} exposure and raise the risk of dose-related adverse effects.

references.citation: Mechanistic pattern: enzyme inhibition of UGT pathway can increase exposure of substrates.
